channel.title: Give your feedback
channel.description:
## We love feedback!
This is the right place to post your feedback about mangOH or mangOH websites. We love both positive and negative feedback as long as it is constructive and helps us progress in the right direction.
Please get sure you did introduce yourself first in the [water cooler discussions category](/c/water-cooler-discussions). We are human; we hear better from people we know.
